headline: RTX Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: ARLINGTON - RTX announced today that its Board of Directors declared a dividend of 63 cents per outstanding share of RTX common stock.The dividend will be payable on March 20, 2025 to shareowners of...

headline: RTX Names CEO Calio to Succeed Hayes as Chairman
summary: By Colin Kellaher RTX has designated its president and chief executive, Christopher Calio, to succeed Gregory Hayes as chairman of the aerospace and defense company, effective April 30. RTX...

headline: Former RTX CEO Gregory Hayes to step down as chairman

headline: What To Brace For In The Upcoming Job Report
summary: When the Bureau of Labor Statistics reports non-farm payrolls for January on Feb. 7, expect investors to pay little attention to the report. Read more here.
